name: Delay (itch) (MrJoob)
description:
Delay was created for Trijam #82 and was officially completed at 3:26 am

Delay
Delay is a platformer where there is a delay before your inputs start working. Your goal is to make it to point A to point B.

Player Input:
Move - A/D keys
Jump - Space

Extra Information:

Gamejam Link: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-82
